title: Update site palette to Chaniya Choli-inspired colors and remove colored text from photo placeholders

requirements.text: Update the global website color palette to be inspired by traditional Chaniya Choli colors (e.g., rich bridal tones such as deep red/maroon with complementary warm-gold/neutral accents), and apply the updated palette consistently across the entire site (backgrounds, cards, borders, accents, buttons, link/active states) using the existing CSS variable theme system.

quotes: chang our colours to our chanya cholli

acceptanceCriteria: Theme colors are changed by updating the existing CSS variables in frontend/src/index.css (light and dark modes remain coherent and readable).

All sections and shared components that rely on theme tokens (bg-background, text-foreground, text-primary, bg-accent, borders, buttons, etc.) reflect the new Chaniya Choli-inspired palette without introducing hardcoded one-off colors.
Contrast remains acceptable for headings, body text, and interactive states in both light and dark themes.

requirements.text: Remove colored text styling from all photo/placeholder areas across the site so that any text shown inside photo placeholders stays neutral (foreground/muted) and does not switch to an accent/primary color on hover or interaction.

quotes: in all the photos remove the text colour

acceptanceCriteria: In ColorPlaceholdersSection, the label text and the "[Photo to be added]" caption do not change to primary/accent colors on hover (remove group-hover text color changes); they remain neutral (e.g., text-foreground / text-muted-foreground) in all states.
Any other placeholder areas that include text (e.g., header/mobile logo photo box label) do not use accent/primary text colors or hover-to-primary text color changes.
Only text coloring behavior inside photo/placeholder areas is changed; non-photo UI text accents elsewhere (e.g., section dividers, buttons) continue to follow the updated site theme.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui and the Internet Identity/actor hooks listed as immutable must not be edited.
Backend is single-actor Motoko and should not be modified for this request (no backend functionality is needed).
nonGoals: Do not add new sections or change existing content/copy beyond what is required to update colors and remove colored text within photo placeholders.
Do not implement image uploading or replace placeholder images with real photos.

preferencesToAdd: Use a Chaniya Choli-inspired color palette across the site.
Avoid colored/accent text inside photo placeholder areas; keep placeholder text neutral.
